item.title: SilenceMee
item.description: SilenceMee will pause/resume the Meedio music player when you launch selected executables via the Program Module or launch the internal video player. New feature allows you to restore the music play-state when restarting Meedio.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: ControlMee
item.description: ControlMee allows you to use your Meedio remote to control external applications via key mappings. Supports import/export of program key maps to make it easy to share. Supports a keyboard hook and numeric keyboard.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: PlayMee
item.description: PlayMee is a video player enhancer. It plays media based on user-defined conditions in Meedio or external players. Includes: off-line media support with prompts; auto-play of DVD, SVCD, VCD, any file-type; automatic mounting of images; Intro/Trailer suppo
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: Respond
item.description: Respond is an event driven plugin that offers functionality similar to a lite scripting language. The plugin will listen for user-defined events (such as a video starting to play) and answer with user-defined responses.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: RS232
item.description: Control devices via RS232. You can send a single command or a macro containing many commands.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: Screensaver+
item.description: Screensaver+ is a screensaver and slideshow enhancer (randomize it!). Screensavers can be picture slideshows, datafeed screen files, music visualizations, or external programs. Automatic slideshows with any media insertion!
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: USB-UIRT
item.description: Use the USB-UIRT with Meedio. Supports receive only at this time.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: XML2mee
item.description: Imports XML data into a Meedio Library. It has built-in support for DVD Profiler, Ant Movie Catalog, Movie Collector, ReplayTV, iTunes and mee2XML.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave

item.title: DynamicMenus
item.description: Helps automatically configure some Meedio settings dynamically.
item.author: binary64

item.title: CallerID+
item.description: Displays Caller ID information via a skinnable overlay from a TAPI v3.0 modem or a YAC server. Supports pictures, call logging, phone number formatting, name/picture changing, and message playing.
item.author: Stewart Hargrave
